Name: team_status_active
Description: Ensure the team is in an active status

Name: feature_priority_high
Description: Feature should have a high priority

Name: blocker_status_open
Description: Ensure blockers are actively being addressed

Name: user_story_status_to_do
Description: Ensure user stories are starting to be worked on

Name: task_status_not_completed
Description: Ensure not all tasks are completed

Name: stakeholder_relevance_high
Description: Stakeholder should be relevant to the feature

Name: epic_priority_high
Description: Epic should have a high priority

Name: sprint_backlog_exists
Description: Sprint Backlog must be defined for a Sprint

Name: road_map_version_defined
Description: A version must be defined in the roadmap
